project.description: 每天定时清理镜像构建的中间层

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: yes|docker container prune yes|docker image prune -a yes|docker volume prune docker builder prune -f --keep-storage=200GB df -h|grep /dev/vda|awk '{print$5}' #apt install curl gnupg -y #curl -fsSL https://bazel.build/bazel-release.pub.gpg | gpg --dearmor > bazel.gpg #mv bazel.gpg /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/ #echo "deb [arch=amd64] https://storage.googleapis.com/bazel-apt stable jdk1.8" |tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/bazel.list #apt-get update #apt install bazel-3.4.1 -y #ln -s /usr/bin/bazel-3.4.1 /usr/bin/bazel #bazel --version
